description: An informational message. This notification does not
correspond to an alarm so would not be stored in the
active alarm table and it does not have a corresponing
clear.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-OME6500-ALARM-EXT-MIB::ome6500ExtAlarmMessage CIENA-OME6500-ALARM-EXT-MIB::ome6500ExtAlarmMessageResource o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 CIENA-OME6500-ALARM-EXT-MIB::ome6500ExtAlarmMessageResourceDescription s "NEtype=NEname\;componentType=componentInstanceId\;subcompType=subcompInstanceId" CIENA-OME6500-ALARM-EXT-MIB::ome6500ExtAlarmMessageDateAndTime x 07cc09010F1E00002b011E CIENA-OME6500-ALARM-EXT-MIB::ome6500ExtAlarmMessageDocumentationPointer s EXAMPLE CIENA-OME6500-ALARM-EXT-MIB::ome6500ExtAlarmMessageInfo s EXAMPLE

description: This object identifies the resource that this message pertains to
If there is no corresponding resource, then
the value of this object MUST be 0.0.
variables.name: CIENA-OME6500-ALARM-EXT-MIB::ome6500ExtAlarmMessageResource

description: This is a textual description of the resource this message
pertains to.
The format of the string is as follows:
NEtype=NEname;componentType=componentInstanceId;subcompType=subcompInstanceId;....
With NE as the root, the entire containment with the list of Relative
Distinguished Names (RDNs) is presented upto the
point where the messaging component is clearly identified.
Semicolon is the delimiter between a 'category=value' pair.
The string can only contain alphanumeric characters and
underscores. No commas, spaces, slashes, hyphens, or
dollar signs are allowed
variables.name: CIENA-OME6500-ALARM-EXT-MIB::ome6500ExtAlarmMessageResourceDescription

description: The local date and time when the message originated.
Implementations MUST include the offset from UTC
if available. Implementation in environments in which
the UTC offset is not available is NOT RECOMMENDED.
variables.name: CIENA-OME6500-ALARM-EXT-MIB::ome6500ExtAlarmMessageDateAndTime

description: This object servces as a pointer to documentation related to this
problem.
If there is no specific document pointer for this alarm, this object
is a null length string.
variables.name: CIENA-OME6500-ALARM-EXT-MIB::ome6500ExtAlarmMessageDocumentationPointer

description: A textual discription of the event that has occurred
suitable to display to an operator.
variables.name: CIENA-OME6500-ALARM-EXT-MIB::ome6500ExtAlarmMessageInfo
